name: 林雅惠
objective:
本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
The purpose of Statistics is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data.  A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.
schedule:
1. 2/20 Course overview
2. 2/27 Class Recess- Peace Memorial day
3. 3/06 Ch9 Interval Estimation
4. 3/13 Ch9 Interval Estimation
5. 3/20 Review Test/Ch10 One-Sample Hypothesis Testing
6. 3/27 Ch10 One-Sample Hypothesis Testing
7. 4/03 Class Recess-Spring Break 
8. 4/10 Ch11 Two-Sample Hypothesis Testing
9. 4/17 Midterm assessment
10. 4/24 Ch11 Two-Sample Hypothesis Testing
11. 5/01 Ch12 Inference about Population Variances
12. 5/08 Ch12 Inference about Population Variances 
13. 5/15 Ch13 Correlation and Linear Regression
14. 5/22 Ch13 Correlation and Linear Regression
15. 5/29 Ch14 Multiple Regression Analysis
16. 6/05 Ch14 Multiple Regression Analysis
17. 6/12 Experimental Design and Analysis of Variance
18. 6/19 Final assessment
materials: DOUGLAS A. LIND, WILLIAM G. MARCHAL & SAMUEL A. WATHEN, BASIC STATISTICS FOR BUSINESS AND ECONOMICS, 10th ed., McGraw-Hill Publisher Inc.
consultation: 1.If students have any questions, students can ask directly during the class time2.If students have any questions, students can make an appointment to discuss by e-mail (yhvica@ntut.edu.tw)．
